mapper.insert: insert into question (title, description, gmt_create, gmt_modify,account_id,tag) values (#{title},#{description},#{gmt_create},#{gmt_modify},#{account_id},#{tag})
mapper.select: select * from question where id = #{id} and account_id=#{account_id}
mapper.update: update question set account_id=#{account_id}, title=#{title}, description=#{description}, gmt_create=#{gmt_create}, gmt_modify=#{gmt_modify}, tag=#{tag} where id=#{id}
